name: Panther Hunting Simulator 4x4
description:
Panther Safari Hunting Simulator 4x4 is Africa jungle safari adventure for real hunters where you have to hunt wild panthers, black tigers and leopards. Drive your 4x4 offroad vehicle in North America jungle to find and shoot the wild hunting animals. To Kill all the panther with sniper you need to move around in safari jungle on the european off road SUV jeep. This is new hunting simulator game of 2018 where you have to hunt animals for your survival in wild jungle. This new panther hunting game is a hunting animals fury where American hunting is going on just like forest hunting. Drive to Hunt the panther with hunting rifles!

As a Africa hunter get ready for hunt the four footed animals in luxury offroader Vehicles. Animal attack hunter Uses sniper view for better precision. It's a sniper animal shooting in real jungle of Africa, Europe, Australia, America and Asia. In hunting park the lions can kill you with single hunting attack just like wild animal attack in the forest, mountain, hunting hills and woods of savanna.

In endless hunting mode, grab your sniper to shoot the various animals like deer, rhinoceroses, lions, buffalos, zebras and many other animals on the African continent. Your goal is to kill all panthers in your sniper range.

In hunting campaigns shooting all wild animals is not allowed you have to kill only the dark panthers, Black jaguars, wild cats, dangerous tigers and hunting lions without hunting dove.


How To Play Panther Safari Hunting Simulator 4x4 game:
- Follow the hunting regulations to be the baddest hunter
- Shoot straight with sniper to have a successful hunt
- Drive the 4x4 off-road vehicles to search the prey and defend their angry attack
- Keep a distance from quarry otherwise they will attack or get scared
- Use mini-map to search the american pickup 4x4
- As a real hunter use sniper zoom to aim and shoot the wild animals

Features of Panther Safari Hunting Simulator 4x4:

- You can enjoy this hunting game offline
- Realistic animation of fighting animals
- New hunting games 2018
- Wild Africa Safari Animal Hunting Simulation
- Slow motion bullet effects
- Russian hunting jeeps and Suvs
- Diverse animal life for best hunters
